item.title: Report X-2023081405
item.description:
Report X-2023081405

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-13T18:13:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-12
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO A LEAKER, NOTICED IT WAS A HAZARDOUS METERIAL AND USING PPE AND DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEET, RESPONDER CONTAINED AND TRANSPORTED BACK TO PROSSESING CENTER AT PROSSESING CENTER THE PRODUCT WOULD NOT STOP LEAKING SO RESPONDER ABSORBED THE MATERIAL AND PROCESSED THOUGH DMP

item.title: Report I-2023080027
item.description:
Report I-2023080027

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-13T18:13:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-26
  • City: OREM
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: LEAKING PACKAGE ON THE DMP TABLE. RESPONDER MARKED PACKAGE AS A LEAKING PACKAGE IN ETT WERE ETT STATED TO PROCESS MATERIAL THROUGH DMP. RESPONDER HAD FOUND THE SDS TO COEFECT MINUTE SPRAY. SDS STATED WAS A UN1170 ETHANOL SOLUTINS. RESPONDER THEN SOLIDIFIED THE REMAINING CONTAINERS AND BAGGED AS DMP MATERIAL, FINISHED PROCESSING THROUGH DMP AND SET THE PACKAGE ASIDE. RESPONDER CALLED HAZMAT HELP LINE.

item.title: Report X-2023080903
item.description:
Report X-2023080903

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-11T03:12:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-11
  • City: NORTH SALT LAKE
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: I found the package next to the QA cage in a red hazmat bin right after the morning sort had ended. While processing the damage there were no indications that it was a hazmat. I looked up the SDS for the product that was leaking and discovered that it was a hazmat. DescribePack: Upon inspection, there was a hole in the bag that the inside container was in. It was leaking from a small crack in the bottom of the plastic bottle. DurationRel: 6 and MitigateEffect: Once the leaking package was discovered, it was put in a hazmat bin and placed in front of the QA cage.

item.title: Report X-2023080376
item.description:
Report X-2023080376

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-11T03:12:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-28
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO UNLOAD FOR LEAKING PACKAGE. WHEN OPENED RESPONDER DISCOVERED ON OF THE TWO METAL CANS WAS LEAKING OUT THE BOTTOM OF THE CONTAINER ALL OVER THE BOTTOM OF THE BOX AND ALL OVER BOTH CONTAINERS.
